arts.ttl: Sturm Graz vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest travel to Austria on Thursday for a crucial Europa League match against Sturm Graz. This marks a vital test for new manager Sean Dyche. He is aiming to build on a vital draw against Manchester United last weekend. However, Forest face a tough opponent in Sturm Graz. The Austrian side are notoriously strong […] The post Sturm Graz vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest looking to extend 34-year European streak in Sturm Graz game
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest will be bidding to extend a 34-year streak when they square off against Sturm Graz in the Europa League on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: Sturm Graz vs Nottingham Forest predictions: Have faith in Forest's forwards
arts.sum: Simon Barlow expects Nottingham Forest to continue to get amongst the goals in the Europa League when they face Sturm Graz in Austria on Thursday evening.
